com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class ComponentProxy<T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentProxy<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedComponent, HorizontalComponent

    public class ComponentProxy<T extends IComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IComponentProxy<T>
    Implementation of IComponentProxy, redirecting to a component stored in a field.
